paragraphs.text:
%md
#### The Drill notebook contains samples of Apache Drill queries that you can run in your Apache Zeppelin notebook.

[MapR Data Science Refinery Documentation](https://mapr.com/docs/61/Zeppelin/ZeppelinDrill.html)

#### Pre-requisistes

Before running Drill queries, make sure you have configured the [Drill JDBC interpreter](https://mapr.com/docs/61/Zeppelin/ConfigureJDBCInterpreter.html#concept_b5l_xdk_qbb__section_o3n_c2k_qbb).

msg.data:
The Drill notebook contains samples of Apache Drill queries that you can run in your Apache Zeppelin notebook.

MapR Data Science Refinery Documentation

Pre-requisistes

Before running Drill queries, make sure you have configured the Drill JDBC interpreter.
